interaction.banned: 당신의 계정 또는 서버가 현제 **정지 상태**입니다.

moderation.invalid_user_warn: 유요하지 않은 사용자에요! (서버를 경고 할 수 없으니 서버 운영자를 경고하세요.)
moderation.invalid_duration: 유요하지 않은 기간이에요! `7d` 또는 `24h`와 비슷하게 입력해 주세요.
moderation.warned: 당신이 **경고**되었어요. 추가 규칙 위반시 Unifier 관리자들이 더 엄격한 조치를 취할 수 있어요.
moderation.temp_ban: <t:{unix}:f>까지 Unifier 채팅방에서 메시지를 보낼 수 없어요. <t:{unix}:R> 채팅이 다시 가능 해져요.
moderation.perm_ban: 영구적으로 Unifier 채팅방에서 메시지를 보낼 수 없어요.
moderation.appeal_body: 만약 부당하게 처벌되었다고 생각하시면, `{prefix}!appeal`을 실행해서 항소가 가능합니다.

plugins.locked: 모듈 및 Modifier 관리는 봇을 재시작 할 때까지 불가능해요.

rooms.invalid: 유요하지 않은 채팅방이에요. `{prefix}rooms`를 사용하시면 모든 채팅방을 볼 수 있어요.

cogmeta.name: :wrench: 시스템 관리자
cogmeta.description:
봇 시스템 대부분을 관리하는 모듈입니다.

Green이 개발함

error_handler.servers_only: 이 명령어는 서버에서만 실행할 수 있어요.
error_handler.dms_only: 이 명령어는 다이렉트 메시지에서만 실행할 수 있어요.
error_handler.no_room_management: 이 채팅방을 관리할 수 있는 권한이 없어요.
error_handler.no_room_join: 이 채팅방에 연결할 수 있는 권한이 없어요.
error_handler.banned: 당신의 계정 또는 서버가 현제 **정지 상태**입니다. 자세한 정보가 필요하시면 `{prefix}standing`을 실행하세요.
error_handler.under_attack: 이 서버가 공격 방지 모드를 활성화했어요. 일부 기능을 사용할 수 없어요.
error_handler.too_many_perms: 봇은 `{permission} 권환이 필요 없으니, 이 권환을 삭제해 주세요.
error_handler.permissions: 이 명령어를 사용할 수 있는 권한이 없어요.
error_handler.unexpected: 명령어 실행 중 예상치 않은 오류가 발생했어요.
error_handler.handler_error: 오류 처리 중 실행 중 예상치 않은 오류가 발생했어요.

eval.error: An error occurred while executing the code.
eval.output_blocked: 에러 메시지에 봇 토큰이 있어서 보내지 않았어요.

shutdown.restart_locked_body: 부트로더가 업데이트 되었어요. 봇을 종료한 후 다시 시작해주세요.
shutdown.safemode_desc: 모든 Modifier가 비활성화된 안전 모드로 재시작합니다.
shutdown.core_desc: 모든 Modifier과 대부분 시스템 모듈이 비활성화된 코어부트로 재시작합니다.

modifiers.title: Unifier Modifiers
modifiers.system_plugin:
# 시스템 Modifier
Modifier를 제거할 수 없어요.

extensions.title: Unifier 모듈
extensions.system_module:
# 시스템 모듈
모듈을 비활성화할 수 없어요.

reload.disabled: 모듈 및 Modifier 관리는 봇을 재시작 할 때까지 불가능해요.

install.trust: 신뢰할 수 있는 출처에서만 플러그인을 설치하세요!
install.question: `{plugin}` Modifier를 설치할까요?
install.alphanumeric_body: Modifier ID들은 영숫자, 대시 및 밑줄 부호만 포함할 수 있어요.
install.exists_body:
이 Modifier는 이미 설치되어 있어요!

이름: `{name}`
버전: `{version}`
install.unsupported: 당신의 Unifier는 이 Modifier를 지원하지 않아요. 최소 릴리즈 `{minimum}`가 필요해요.
install.invalid_repo: 코드 저장소 URL 또는 plugin.json 파일이 유요하지 않아요.
install.invalid_platform: 이 Modifier는 유요하지 않은 플랫폼 이름을 가지고 있어요.
install.no_emoji_slots: 기본 서버에 이모지 공간이 충분하지 않아요. 빈 슬롯 총 {required}개가 필요하지만 슬롯 {available}개만 사용 가능해요.
install.content_protection_desc: Modifier가 메시지에 위험한 내용물이 있는지 확인하거나 사용자를 차단할 수 있어요. 임시 차단은 Bridge 재로드 후 삭제되요.
install.content_processing_desc: Modifier가 메시지 전송 전 내용물이나 발신자 정보를 수정할 수 있어요.
install.bridge_platform_desc: Modifier가 Unifier Bridge 외부 플랫폼 지원을 제공할 수 있어요.
install.emojis_desc: Modifier에 이모지팩이 있어요. 설치 후 `{prefix}uiemojis {plugin_id}`를 실행해서 이모지팩을 활성화할 수 있어요.

uninstall.warning: 모든 Modifier의 파일을 제거합니다. 제거를 실행하면 취소할 수 없어요!
uninstall.question: `{plugin}` Modifier를 제거할까요?

upgrade.clonefail_body: Git clone 작업에 오류가 발생했어요. 콘솔을 확인하세요.
upgrade.available_body:
Unifier 업데이트가 가능해요!

현재 버전: {current_ver} (`{current_rel}`)
새로운 버전: {new_ver} (`{new_rel}`)
upgrade.normal_backup: Unifier 소프트웨어, 설정 및 데이터 파일들이 `[Unifier root directory]/old`에 백업되었어요.
upgrade.skipped_backup: Unifier 소프트웨어, 설정 및 데이터 파일 백업이 **안되어 있어요**! 업데이트가 실패하면 데이터 손실 또는 시스템 오류가 발생할 수 있어요!
upgrade.failed_backup: Unifier 소프트웨어, 설정 및 데이터 파일 백업이 **실패했어요**! 업데이트가 실패하면 데이터 손실 또는 시스템 오류가 발생할 수 있어요!
upgrade.modification_wipe: 시스템 업데이트의 일부가 아닌 이상, 모든 Unifier 코드 수정이 삭제됩니다.
upgrade.backupfail_body: 백업을 만들 수 없었음으로 업데이트가 취소되었어요.
upgrade.download_fail: 업데이트를 다운로드 할 수 없었어요. 롤백이 필요하지 않습니다.
upgrade.dependency_fail: 필요한 라이브러리를 설치할 수 없었어요. 롤백이 필요하지 않습니다.
upgrade.rollback_fail:
업데이트가 실패했어요. 봇이 사용 불가능 상태일 수 있습니다.
자세한 내용은 콘솔에서 확인하세요.
upgrade.success_rpossible: 업데이트를 적용하려면 봇을 재시작을 해야 될 수도 있어요.
upgrade.shutdown_body: 업데이트가 완료되었어요. 봇을 종료한 후 재시작 해주세요.
upgrade.hint_force: **힌트**: 강제로 업데이트를 하시려면 `{prefix}upgrade system force`을 실행하세요.
upgrade.question: `{plugin}` Modifier를 업데이트 할까요?
upgrade.reload_warning: 일부 모듈을 재시작 할 수 없었어요.

uiemojis.description: 이모지팩을 활성화 합니다."base" 이모지팩을 활성화하면 이모지가 일반으로 초기화됩니다.

help.title: {botname} 도움말
help.choose_cmd: 명령어의 자세한 정보를 보시려면 명령어를 선택해 주세요!

forcereg.description: 명령어를 등록합니다. 자동 등록이 실패할때만 사용하세요.

cloud.encrypted: 모든 백업들은 전송 또는 저장할 때 암호와되어 있습니다.
cloud.invalid_body: 서버가 응답하지 않거나 유요하지 않은 응답을 보냈어요.
cloud.question: 이 백업을 복원할까요?
cloud.download: config.toml 및 data.json 파일들이 서버에서 다운로드 됩니다.
cloud.overwrite: 이미 있는 config.json 및 data.json 파일들은 **삭제**됩니다.
cloud.success_body: 복원된 데이터를 적용하려면 봇을 재시작 해주세요.
cloud.failed_body: 데이터를 복원할 수 없었어요. 암호화 비밀번호 및 솔트가 올바른지 확인하세요.

make.alphanumeric: 채팅방 이름은 영숫자, 대시 및 밑줄 부호만 포함할 수 있어요.
make.private_desc: 그냥 나와 내 친구들만 쓸 채팅방.
make.private_limit: 비밀방을 더 만들 수 없어요. 비밀방 총 {limit}개만 만들 수 있어요.
make.unique_fail: 10번의 시도로 고유 채팅방 이름을 생성할 수 없었어요.
make.dryrun_warning: 드라이 런입니다. 실제로 채팅방을 만들지는 않았어요.

create-invite.invites_limit: 초대 코드를 더 만들 수 없어요. 이미 있는 초대 코드를 먼저 삭제하시고 다시 시도하세요.
create-invite.permanent_disabled: 영구 초대 코드가 활성화가 안되어 있어요
create-invite.duration_toolong: 초대 코드는 7일보다 더 오래 유요할 수 없어요.
create-invite.join: 서버는 `{prefix}join {invite}`를 실행해서 이 비밀방을 참가할 수 었어요.
create-invite.dm_fail: 초대 코드를 만들었지만 전송을 못 했어요. 초대 코드를 확인하려면 다이렉트 메시지를 키고 `{prefix}invites`를 실행하세요.
create-invite.success: 초대 코드를 만들었습니다. 다이렉트 메시지를 확인하세요!

invites.dm_fail: Could not DM invites. Please turn your DMs on.

display-name.no_name: There is no display name to reset for this room.
display-name.toolong: Display name is too long. Please keep it within 32 characters.

roomdesc.no_desc: There is no description to reset for this room.

roomemoji.not_emoji: This is not a valid emoji.
roomemoji.no_emoji: There is no emoji to reset for this room.

restrict.description: Restricts/unrestricts a room. Only admins will be able to collect to this room when restricted.

roomlock.description: Locks/unlocks a room. Only moderators and admins will be able to chat in this room when locked.

disband.confirm_body: Once the room is disbanded, it's gone forever!

bind.description: Connects the channel to a given room.
bind.check_title: Checking if channel is already connected...
bind.check_body: We're checking if this channel is already connected. Give us a moment...
bind.already_linked_body:
This channel is already connected to `{room}`!
Run `{prefix}unbind {room}` to disconnect the channel.
bind.already_room:
Your server is already linked to this room.
**Accidentally deleted the webhook?** `{prefix}unlink {room}` it then `{prefix}link {room}` it back.
bind.no_rules:
This room doesn't have any rules yet! For now, follow the main room's rules (and common sense).
You can always view rules if any get added using `{prefix}rules {room}`.
bind.disclaimer: Failure to follow room rules may result in user or server restrictions.
bind.display:
By joining this room, you and your members agree to these rules.
This message will be pinned (if possible) for better accessibility to the rules.
bind.no_agree: Server did not agree to room rules.
bind.room_banned: You are baned from this room.

unbind.description: Disconnects the server from a given room.
unbind.not_connected: This channel is not connected to a room.
unbind.success_semi: Channel has been unbinded, but the webhook could not be deleted.

roomkick.description: Kicks a server from the room.
roomkick.not_connected: This server isn't connected to this room.
roomkick.success: Server {server} was kicked from the room.

roomban.description: Bans a server from the room.
roomban.success: Server {server} was banned from the room.

map.description: Maps channels to rooms in bulk.
map.check_body: We're looking for channels that can be binded. Give us a moment...
map.map_body:
The following channels will be mapped.
If the channel does not exist, they will be created automatically.
map.say_hi: Channels are now connected! Say hi!

rules.description: Displays room rules for the specified room.
rules.no_rules: This room doesn't have any rules yet! For now, follow the main room's rules (and common sense).

addrule.description: Adds a rule to a given room.
addrule.exceed: You can only have up to 25 rules in a room!

delrule.description: Removes a given rule from a given room.
delrule.invalid: Rule must be a number higher than 0.

addbridge.description: Allows given user's webhooks to be bridged.
addbridge.already_exists: This user is already in the whitelist!
addbridge.allow_body: This will allow messages sent via webhooks created by this user to be bridged through Unifier.
addbridge.success_body: This user's webhooks can now bridge messages through Unifier!

delbridge.description: Prevents given user's webhooks from being bridged.
delbridge.not_whitelist: This user isn't in the whitelist!
delbridge.remove_body: This will stop this user's webhooks from bridging messages.
delbridge.success_body: This user's webhooks can no longer bridge messages through Unifier.

rooms.title: {botname} rooms
rooms.body: Choose a room to view its info!
rooms.noresults_body_search: There are no rooms matching your search query.
rooms.choose_room: Choose a room to view its info!
rooms.no_rules:
The room admins haven't added rules for this room yet.
Though, do remember to use common sense and refrain from doing things that you shouldn't do.

servers.description: Lists all servers connected to a given room.
servers.title: Servers connected to `{room}`

toggle_emoji.description: Enables or disables usage of server emojis as Global Emojis.
toggle_emoji.success_set: All members can now use your emojis!
toggle_emoji.success_unset: All members can now no longer use your emojis!

avatar.no_avatar: You have no avatar! Run `{prefix}avatar <url>` or set an avatar in your profile settings.
avatar.custom_avatar: You have a custom avatar! Run `{prefix}avatar <url>` to change it, or run `{prefix}avatar remove` to remove it.
avatar.default_avatar: You have a default avatar! Run `{prefix}avatar <url>` to set a custom one.
avatar.title: This is your Unifier avatar!
avatar.error_missing: You don't have a custom avatar!
avatar.confirmation_body: If you're satisfied, hit that green Apply button!

color.title: Your user color
color.success_inherit: Messages on supported platforms will now inherit your Discord role color.
color.success_custom: Messages on supported platforms will now inherit the custom color.

nickname.description: Sets a nickname. An empty provided nickname will reset it.
nickname.exceed: Please keep your nickname within 33 characters.

ping.fair_body: Nothing's wrong, but the latency could be better.
ping.slow_body: Bot latency is higher than normal, messages may be slow to arrive.
ping.tooslow_body: Something is DEFINITELY WRONG here. Consider checking [Discord status](https://discordstatus.com) page.

emojis.description: Shows a list of all global emojis available on the instance.
emojis.title: {botname} emojis
emojis.body: Choose an emoji to view its info!
emojis.noresults_body_search: There are no emojis matching your search query.
emojis.instructions_body: Type `[emoji: {emojiname}]` in your message to use this emoji!

modping.description: Pings all moderators to the chat. Use only when necessary.
modping.disabled: Modping is disabled, contact your instance's owner.
modping.no_moderator: This instance doesn't have a moderator role set up. Contact your Unifier admins.
modping.bad_config: It appears the home guild has configured Unifier wrong, and I cannot ping its moderators.

report.disabled: Reporting and logging are disabled, contact your instance's owner.
report.question: How does this message violate our rules?
report.details_prompt: Add additional context or information we should know here.
report.sign_prompt: Sign this only if your report is truthful and in good faith.
report.title: Report message
report.report_title: Message report - content is as follows
report.submitted_by: Submitted by {username} - please do not disclose actions taken against the user.
report.success_body:
Thanks for your report! Our moderators will have a look at it, then decide what to do.
For privacy reasons, we will not disclose actions taken against the user.
report.failed: Something went wrong while submitting the report.

serverstatus.description: Shows your server's Modifier restriction status.
serverstatus.title: Server status
serverstatus.body_ok: Your server is not restricted by Modifiers.
serverstatus.body_restricted: Your server is currently limited by a Modifier.

level.description: Shows you or someone else's level and EXP.
level.disabled: Leveling system is disabled on this instance.

bridge.blocked_body: Your message was blocked. Moderators may be able to see the blocked content.
bridge.blocked_report_title: Content blocked - content is as follows
bridge.automated: This is an automated action performed by a Modifier, always double-check before taking action
bridge.owner_immunity: just as a fyi: this would have banned you
bridge.ban_reason: Automatic action carried out by security Modifiers
bridge.cannot_appeal: Unfortunately, this ban cannot be appealed using `{prefix}appeal`. You will need to ask moderators for help.
bridge.limited_limit: Your server is currently limited for security. The maximum character limit for now is **{count} characters**.
bridge.limited_cooldown: Your server is currently limited for security. Please wait before sending another message.
bridge.delete_fail: Parent message could not be deleted. I may be missing the `Manage Messages` permission.
bridge.filesize_limit: Your files passed the 25MB limit. Some files will not be sent.

block.description: Blocks a user or server from bridging messages to your server.
block.self_target_guild: You can't block your own server :thinking
block.mod_immunity:
Unifier moderators are immune to blocks!
(Though, do feel free to report anyone who abuses this immunity.)
block.success: User/server can no longer forward messages to this server!

unblock.description: Unblocks a user or server from bridging messages through Unifier.
unblock.success: User/server can now forward messages to this server!

warn.no_reason: You need to have a reason to warn this user.
warn.bot: ...why would you want to warn a bot?
warn.success: User has been warned and notified.
warn.success_nodm: User has DMs with bot disabled. Warning will be logged anyways.

ban.description: Bans a user or server from the Unifier network.
ban.warning: You have been **warned**. Further rule violations may lead to sanctions on the moderators' discretion.
ban.restricted_perma: Your ability to text and speak have been **restricted indefinitely**. This will not automatically expire.
ban.restricted_temp: Your ability to text and speak have been **restricted** until <t:{expiry}:f>. This will expire <t:{expiry}:R>.
ban.mistake_body: If you think we didn't make the right call, you can always appeal your ban using `{prefix}!appeal`.
ban.recently_banned: A user was recently banned from Unifier!
ban.success: User was global banned. They may not use Unifier for the given time period.
ban.modlogs_body: This user has **{recent_warns}** recent warnings ({total_warns} in total) and **{recent_bans}** recent bans ({total_bans} in total) on record.

unban.description: Unbans a user or server from the Unifier network.

delwarn.title: Warning deleted
delwarn.failed: Could not find warning - maybe the index was too high?

delban.description: Deletes a logged ban. Does not unban the user.
delban.title: Ban deleted
delban.disclaimer: WARNING: This does NOT unban the user.
delban.failed: Could not find ban - maybe the index was too high?

fullban.description: Blocks a user from using Unifier.
fullban.success_set: User has been banned from the bot.
fullban.success_unset: User has been unbanned from the bot.

appealban.description: Bans a user from appealing their ban.
appealban.success_set: User can no longer appeal bans.

appeal.description: Appeals your ban, if you have one.
appeal.no_ban: You don't have an active ban!
appeal.banned: You cannot appeal this ban, contact staff for more info.
appeal.missing_ban: You're currently banned, but we couldn't find the ban reason. Contact moderators directly to appeal.
appeal.confirm: Please confirm that this is the ban you're appealing.
appeal.title: Appeal ban
appeal.reason_prompt: Why should we consider your appeal?
appeal.sign_prompt: Sign this only if your appeal is in good faith.
appeal.appeal_title: Ban appeal - reason is as follows
appeal.success_body: We'll get back to you once the moderators have agreed on a decision. Please be patient and respectful towards moderators while they review your appeal.
appeal.accepted_body:
This ban has been removed from your account and will no longer impact your standing.
You may now continue chatting!
appeal.rejected_body: You may continue chatting once the current ban expires.

delete.no_message: You didn't reply to a message when running this command!
delete.parent_delete: Deleted message (parent deleted, copies will follow)

standing.title: {identifier}'s account standing
standing.allgood_body: You're on a clean or good record. Thank you for upholding your Unifier instance's rules!
standing.fair_body: You've broken one or more rules recently. Please follow the rules next time!
standing.caution_body: You've broken many rules recently. Moderators may issue stronger punishments.
standing.warning_body: You've severely or frequently violated rules. A permanent suspension may be imminent.
standing.suspended_body: You've been temporarily suspended from this Unifier instance.
standing.suspended_body_perm: You've been permanently suspended from this Unifier instance.
standing.fullban_body:
This user has been completely suspended from the bot.
Unlike global bans, the user may also not interact with any part of the bot.
standing.bot_body: This is a bot. Bots cannot have an account standing.
standing.info: Standing is calculated based on recent and all-time punishments. Recent punishments will have a heavier effect on your standing.
standing.no_warns_body: There's no warnings on record. Amazing!
standing.no_bans_body: There's no bans on record. Amazing!
standing.success: Your account standing has been DMed to you.

identify.description: Identifies the origin of a message.

bridgelock.warning_body:
This will unload the entire bridge extension.
Lockdown can only be lifted by admins.
bridgelock.fwarning_body:
LOCKDOWNS CANNOT BE REVERSED BY NON-ADMINS!
Do NOT lock down the chat if you don't know what you're doing!

under-attack.enable_body: Users will not be able to send messages in Unifier rooms. Only enable this mode if your server is under attack or is likely to be attacked.
under-attack.disable_body: Users will be able to send messages in Unifier rooms again. Only disable this mode if you're absolutely sure your server is in the clear.
under-attack.disclaimer: **WARNING**: You will not be able to disable this mode without the Manage Channels permission.
under-attack.notify: Make sure you've notified this instance's moderators if you need their assistance.
under-attack.enabled_body: Under Attack mode is now enabled. Your members can no longer chat in Unifier rooms.
under-attack.disabled_body: Under Attack mode is now disabled. Your members can now chat in Unifier rooms again.

alert.invalid: This is not a valid risk type.
alert.send_title: Are you sure you want to send this alert?
alert.misuse_unifier: Misuse will be sanctioned with a 1 month minimum global ban from Unifier. Please use this wisely.
alert.misuse: Misuse may be sanctioned by moderators. Please use this wisely.
alert.willping: Server moderators will be pinged. The main channel will also receive a notification.
alert.success_body: Alert was issued to Unifier network.

unverify.success: **@{user}** is no longer a verified user!

lockdown.warning_body: This will unload ALL EXTENSIONS and lock down the bot until next restart. Continue?
lockdown.fwarning_functions: All functions of the bot will be disabled.
lockdown.fwarning_reboot: To restore the bot, a reboot is required.
lockdown.success_body: The bot is now in a crippled state. It cannot recover without a reboot.

setup_menu.welcome_body: Welcome to Unifier - an open source, fast, and versatile bridge bot.
setup_menu.welcome_continue: First, let's choose your system language, so we can get your Unifier set up and running!
setup_menu.welcome_upgraded: An upgraded installation was detected. If you've used this Unifier instance before, press "Skip".
setup_menu.prefix_body: A prefix is the text that comes before the command. For example, if the prefix is `!`, users will need to run `!command`.
setup_menu.backup_body: How often in seconds should Unifier backup the message cache?
setup_menu.backup_nobackup: If this value is 0, Unifier will only backup the cache on shutdown and reboot.
setup_menu.ping_body: How often in seconds should Unifier ping Discord? This should be used if there's high latency after idling.
setup_menu.ping_noping: If this value is 0, Unifier will never periodically ping Discord's servers.
setup_menu.main_body: Which room should be considered as the main room?
setup_menu.main_name: The room with the matching name will be used to receive automated system messages.
setup_menu.ctx_required: These are required for message reporting to work.
setup_menu.mod_body: What role in your home server is for your Unifier instance's moderators?
setup_menu.logging_body: Enable moderation events logging? You can choose what to log in the next step.
setup_menu.logging_actions: Note: If enabled, moderation actions such as warnings and global bans will be logged. This cannot be disabled.
setup_menu.channel_body: Which channel should be used for logging?
setup_menu.rchannel_body: Which channel should be used to receive reports?
setup_menu.safefile_body: Restrict attachments to only safe types?
setup_menu.safefile_block: This will block many attachment types, such as archives, executable files, etc.
setup_menu.posts_info: Posts allow users to share their or comment on others' work in a more organized fashion.
setup_menu.proom_body: Which room should be used for sharing Posts?
setup_menu.proom_name: The room with the matching name will be used for sharing Posts.
setup_menu.pcomment_body: Which room should be used for Post comments?
setup_menu.pcomment_name: The room with the matching name will be used for commenting on Posts.
setup_menu.alerts_info: Safety Alerts allow instance moderators to alert connected servers if there is a potential threat.
setup_menu.aroom_body: Which room should be used for Safety Alerts?
setup_menu.aroom_name: The room with the matching name will be used for Safety Alerts.
setup_menu.finish_body: Unifier is now ready for action!
